comments.body:
Without the "--config" flag, where/how do we select GPU config for the build?
Are we sure that the built binaries still use GPU?

Yes, because `--config=win-cuda` is added into `.tf_configure.bazelrc` file when running ./configure with gpu support.
See https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/a4a3a3335bd273e6224d16a934b59531ef239893/configure.py#L726

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +47,51 @@clean_output_base

bazel build -c opt $BUILD_OPTS tensorflow/tools/pip_package:build_pip_package || exit $?

# Create a python test directory to avoid package name conflict
